title: Geeky Mother’s Day Gifts to Celebrate Fandom and Family
description: Celebrate mom with fun fashion, collectibles, and accessories from Star Wars, Doctor Who, Labubu, and beyond.
author: Sabina Graves
excerpt: Celebrate mom with fun fashion, collectibles, and accessories from Star Wars, Doctor Who, Labubu, and beyond.
text: Mother’s Day 2025 is barreling toward us—so it’s go time to get that shopping done as the online windows begin to close and going in stores is getting trickier by the minute. Speaking for new moms who live for geeky style, obsess over adorable tiny creatures, can’t resist theme park gear, and cherish the magic of physical media to chronicle memories, it can be still hard to figure out what someone who puts the kids first might want. First we cover fashion because what mom doesn’t want to find cute outfits for the kids and match sometimes? BoxLunch and PatPat have you covered with looks inspired by Disney faves including Star Wars and Bluey. Then there’s collectibles including the highly coveted Labubu from Pop Mart, which is elusive but totally worth hunting for. And of course because being a mom is a 24/7 job, we have fun pop culture inspired travel and home essentials for the fandom and theme-park enthusiast families! Fashion © BoxLunch Mother’s Day fandom matching outfits are so cute and don’t always have to be the same printed logo t-shirt. Pop culture themed fashion retailers have the latest looks to slay with the littles. BoxLunch currently has the best Bluey options out there. PatPat has a wide selection for those Disney theme park vacationing families including new Stitch ‘fits. Speaking of the blue furry alien, we aren’t forgetting the furchildren as Sassy Woof also has a Stitch collection to get pets looking snappy along with the rest of the family. And of course there’s a lot of Star Wars fun to be had beyond May the 4th thanks to Heroes and Villains with its incredible clothier collections. Bluey Heeler Family Sleepy Time Women’s Cardigan — BoxLunch Exclusive Bluey Blue Quilted Toddler Jacket — BoxLunch Exclusive Bluey Heeler Family Floral Women’s T-Shirt — BoxLunch Exclusive Strawberry Shortcake Embroidered Midi Dress – BoxLunch Exclusive Star Wars Heroes and Villains Leia Sherpa Puffer Jacket Star Wars Heroes and Villains Rebels Of Alderaan Youth Hoodie Star Wars Heroes and Villains May the Fourth limited release shirts PatPat Disney Stitch Tropical Flower Matching set Sassy Woof Dog Stitch accessories collection and sun hat Pat Pat Disney Mickey and Friends Mommy and Me Striped Print Sleeveless Dress and Jumpsuit Barbie “Mom” Vintage Hat – Mattel Creations Monster High “Mummy” Black T-Shirt – Mattel Creations Collectibles © Pop Mart Your mission, should you choose to accept, is to find the mom in your life an official Big Into Energy Labubu from Pop Mart. Set those alarms for the 7 p.m. PT drops online for ordering or in-person pick up, or seek them out in the robo-mart locations, but trust me, The Monsters Labubu is the keychain most moms want to accessorize with right now. And if you can’t find it, Pop Mart also just dropped new collections featuring Arcane and Disney’s Stitch. More collectibles: THE MONSTERS Big into Energy Series-Vinyl Plush Pendant Blind Box – Pop Mart League of Legends: Arcane Series Figures- Pop Mart Disney Stitch Little Emotions Series Figures – Pop Mart Little People Collector Doctor Who TV Series Special Edition Set Funko Pop! Movies DreamWorks The Wild Robot Roz with Fink and Brightbill Funko Pop! DC Studios Superman Krypto Strawberry Shortcake x The Loyal Subjects  ‘Limited Edition’ Classic Version Strawberry Shortcake Disney Princess Moana Cuddle & Care Set with Bitty Baby Doll by American Girl Monster High Potions Mini Dolls: Surprise Character Figures Monster High Designer Series Corazon Marikit Doll – Mattel Creations Travel and on-the-go © Loungefly There are so many fandom travel accessories right now and if you’re planning a Florida trip for the new Epic Universe, we have to talk about the Universal Monsters collection from Loungefly. The Bride of Frankenstein crossbody? To die for and be revived for! More: Sanrio – My Melody x Strawberry Shortcake Quilted Laptop Sleeve Sanrio – Pompompurin x Loungefly Color Dip Mini Backpack Milo and Mimi Weekender Travel Bag Vera Bradley Wicked travel collection Heroes and Villains x Star Wars Ewok belt bag Loungefly – Universal Monsters The Bride Of Frankenstein Stained Glass Crossbody Bag Strawberry Shortcake embroidered denim tote bag – BoxLunch Exclusive Retrospekt x Sanrio – Hello Kitty Howdy Partner 35mm Film Camera Bundle Corkcicle – Disney Princess Leakproof Cruiser CASETiFY x Star Wars Tech accessories  For the home and office © Shutterfly After traveling it’s so easy to let pictures sit on your phone until it runs out of space. As a fan of junk journaling and family trip albums, here are some ways to create everlasting memories with that mom in your life especially if she’s crafty. And we have to include some sweet home goods and retro tech for the moms who grew up on cassette decks. More: Retrospekt x Sanrio Hello Kitty Strawberry Kawaii BX-85 Cassette Player Boombox Buckle Down Stitch Cuddler Pet Bed Studio Ghibli My Neighbor Totoro Plaid Totoro Allover Print Cloth Napkin Set – BoxLunch Exclusive Pokémon Pikachu Chef Hat Tea Cup — BoxLunch Exclusive Bluey Chilli, Bingo, & Bluey Quote Heart-Shaped Pillow – BoxLunch Exclusive Bluey Heeler Family Stacking Mug Set – BoxLunch Exclusive Junk Journaling and craft essentials Ohuhu markers  Stationary subscriptions for the scrapbooking and junk journaling mom from Postmark’d Studios Shutterfly x Disney collection photo books and more Topdrawer KOLO – Tino Limited Edition Fountain Pen in “Mother” Topdrawer Photo Albums DC Comics Superman Cookbook Star Wars: Women of the Galaxy Updated and Expanded Want more io9 news? html:
Mother’s Day 2025 is barreling toward us—so it’s go time to get that shopping done as the online windows begin to close and going in stores is getting trickier by the minute.

Speaking for new moms who live for geeky style, obsess over adorable tiny creatures, can’t resist theme park gear, and cherish the magic of physical media to chronicle memories, it can be still hard to figure out what someone who puts the kids first might want.

First we cover fashion because what mom doesn’t want to find cute outfits for the kids and match sometimes? BoxLunch and PatPat have you covered with looks inspired by Disney faves including Star Wars and Bluey. Then there’s collectibles including the highly coveted Labubu from Pop Mart, which is elusive but totally worth hunting for. And of course because being a mom is a 24/7 job, we have fun pop culture inspired travel and home essentials for the fandom and theme-park enthusiast families!

Fashion

Mother’s Day fandom matching outfits are so cute and don’t always have to be the same printed logo t-shirt. Pop culture themed fashion retailers have the latest looks to slay with the littles. BoxLunch currently has the best Bluey options out there. PatPat has a wide selection for those Disney theme park vacationing families including new Stitch ‘fits. Speaking of the blue furry alien, we aren’t forgetting the furchildren as Sassy Woof also has a Stitch collection to get pets looking snappy along with the rest of the family. And of course there’s a lot of Star Wars fun to be had beyond May the 4th thanks to Heroes and Villains with its incredible clothier collections.

  • Bluey Heeler Family Sleepy Time Women’s Cardigan — BoxLunch Exclusive
  • Bluey Blue Quilted Toddler Jacket — BoxLunch Exclusive
  • Bluey Heeler Family Floral Women’s T-Shirt — BoxLunch Exclusive
  • Strawberry Shortcake Embroidered Midi Dress – BoxLunch Exclusive
  • Star Wars Heroes and Villains Leia Sherpa Puffer Jacket
  • Star Wars Heroes and Villains Rebels Of Alderaan Youth Hoodie
  • Star Wars Heroes and Villains May the Fourth limited release shirts
  • PatPat Disney Stitch Tropical Flower Matching set
  • Sassy Woof Dog Stitch accessories collection and sun hat
  • Pat Pat Disney Mickey and Friends Mommy and Me Striped Print Sleeveless Dress and Jumpsuit
  • Barbie “Mom” Vintage Hat – Mattel Creations
  • Monster High “Mummy” Black T-Shirt – Mattel Creations

Collectibles

Your mission, should you choose to accept, is to find the mom in your life an official Big Into Energy Labubu from Pop Mart. Set those alarms for the 7 p.m. PT drops online for ordering or in-person pick up, or seek them out in the robo-mart locations, but trust me, The Monsters Labubu is the keychain most moms want to accessorize with right now. And if you can’t find it, Pop Mart also just dropped new collections featuring Arcane and Disney’s Stitch.

More collectibles:

  • THE MONSTERS Big into Energy Series-Vinyl Plush Pendant Blind Box – Pop Mart
  • League of Legends: Arcane Series Figures- Pop Mart
  • Disney Stitch Little Emotions Series Figures – Pop Mart
  • Little People Collector Doctor Who TV Series Special Edition Set
  • Funko Pop! Movies DreamWorks The Wild Robot Roz with Fink and Brightbill
  • Funko Pop! DC Studios Superman Krypto
  • Strawberry Shortcake x The Loyal Subjects  ‘Limited Edition’ Classic Version Strawberry Shortcake
  • Disney Princess Moana Cuddle & Care Set with Bitty Baby Doll by American Girl
  • Monster High Potions Mini Dolls: Surprise Character Figures
  • Monster High Designer Series Corazon Marikit Doll – Mattel Creations

Travel and on-the-go

There are so many fandom travel accessories right now and if you’re planning a Florida trip for the new Epic Universe, we have to talk about the Universal Monsters collection from Loungefly. The Bride of Frankenstein crossbody? To die for and be revived for!

More:

  • Sanrio – My Melody x Strawberry Shortcake Quilted Laptop Sleeve
  • Sanrio – Pompompurin x Loungefly Color Dip Mini Backpack
  • Milo and Mimi Weekender Travel Bag
  • Vera Bradley Wicked travel collection
  • Heroes and Villains x Star Wars Ewok belt bag
  • Loungefly – Universal Monsters The Bride Of Frankenstein Stained Glass Crossbody Bag
  • Strawberry Shortcake embroidered denim tote bag – BoxLunch Exclusive
  • Retrospekt x Sanrio – Hello Kitty Howdy Partner 35mm Film Camera Bundle
  • Corkcicle – Disney Princess Leakproof Cruiser
  • CASETiFY x Star Wars Tech accessories 

For the home and office

After traveling it’s so easy to let pictures sit on your phone until it runs out of space. As a fan of junk journaling and family trip albums, here are some ways to create everlasting memories with that mom in your life especially if she’s crafty. And we have to include some sweet home goods and retro tech for the moms who grew up on cassette decks.

More:

  • Retrospekt x Sanrio Hello Kitty Strawberry Kawaii BX-85 Cassette Player Boombox
  • Buckle Down Stitch Cuddler Pet Bed
  • Studio Ghibli My Neighbor Totoro Plaid Totoro Allover Print Cloth Napkin Set – BoxLunch Exclusive
  • Pokémon Pikachu Chef Hat Tea Cup — BoxLunch Exclusive
  • Bluey Chilli, Bingo, & Bluey Quote Heart-Shaped Pillow – BoxLunch Exclusive
  • Bluey Heeler Family Stacking Mug Set – BoxLunch Exclusive
  • Junk Journaling and craft essentials Ohuhu markers 
  • Stationary subscriptions for the scrapbooking and junk journaling mom from Postmark’d Studios
  • Shutterfly x Disney collection photo books and more
  • Topdrawer KOLO – Tino Limited Edition Fountain Pen in “Mother”
  • Topdrawer Photo Albums
  • DC Comics Superman Cookbook
  • Star Wars: Women of the Galaxy Updated and Expanded

Want more io9 news? Check out when to expect the latest Marvel, Star Wars, and Star Trek releases, what’s next for the DC Universe on film and TV, and everything you need to know about the future of Doctor Who.
